The problem is probably because the RPATH is wrong, and it is hardcoding a path to the dynamic library which doesn't match where it is on lambda.

Do we have for building the libraries with relocatable RPATH? I know in PyTorch, this is done externally in our distribution scripts. That would solve @krishnakt031990's problem. Otherwise you'll have to do it by hand.
